firm_information.name: CENTURY 21 Quad J Realty
firm_information.location: 1305 N. E. Big Bend Trail Glen Rose, TX 76043

house_listing.house_description: Large manufactured home (doublewide) on 5.15 acres near power plant. Home needs refurbishment but has 2 living areas, 4 bedrooms, 2 baths, with septic system in place. Subdivision has water system with flat rate of $20.00/month at this time. Large live oaks, some post oaks, and other hardwood trees. Seasonal creek passes through property. Good location - in Glen Rose ISD.
